description:
Hello Bristol Gophers 👋!

We're coming back - and in person.

Speakers:

🗣️ Kyle Welch - Spinning a New Era: Microservices with WebAssembly

Spin is a framework for building event driven microservice applications with WebAssembly. We'll be taking Spin for a spin and talking about some of the benefits to building our applications on top of WebAssembly.

Kyle is a Technical Lead at Tumelo. Initially more focussed JS/TS and all things Web, he's found himself getting closer and closer to Go in the past few years.

🗣️ TBC

⏰ Schedule (possibly):

* 18:00-18:05 intro/welcome
* 18:05-18:35 first speaker
* 18:35-18:45 small break
* 18:45-19:15 second speaker
* 19:15-19:30 farewell/next event info

❤️ Sponsors

* Tumelo (venue)
* TBC (food/drinks)

📍 - Runway East
title: Go Talks - August
